title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2050/97 of 20 October 1997 determining the reductions to be applied in certain Member States to the compensatory payments under the aid scheme for rice producers
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2050/97 of 20 October 1997 determining the reductions to be applied in certain Member States to the compensatory payments under the aid scheme for rice producers
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
